One day a man heard about two amazing villages. One was very _ and the other was very poor. He was interested and wanted to have a look. After he visited the rich village, he was _ and asked the people there," _ is it so ugly?"A villager said,"We thought new trees would 39. _ again after we cut down the big and old ones. We have money now, but our earth becomes sandy. There is no _ and trees cannot grow again."
Then the man visited the poor village and was very surprised _ "They are not poor!" said the man." The people and animals _ very healthy!" The people there said,"We don't have _ but we have a beautiful landscape,and we are very happy." The man thought that more people should _ and enjoy this beautiful landscape. _ he build a teahouse and a big restaurant. From then on, more and more visitors came to this village.
